Ah...that...? Something's wrong...? I'm sorry!
I'll turn on the light right away. Please
wait...

169916.「うわっ なんだ これは！？\n まぶしすぎるっ！！\n ええいっ 早く それを:
This is far too bright! Shut it off this
instant!

169917.「……当時から いつも 失敗ばかりだった私は\n 案の定 発表会でも失敗してしま:
I became the laughing stock of the Alchemia.
I failed my presentation and incurred the
wrath of some influential people.

169918.「その後も アルケミアに戻って\n ひとり 錬金を続けても ライトの生成が\n:
When I returned to the Alchemia and continued
my work on the light, I just couldn't seem to
get it right.

169919.「ああ 今度こそ うまくできると\n 思ったのですが…… また 失敗ですよぅ。\:
Oh, I thought I could do it right this time,
but... I failed again. Here, one more time!

169920.「ぷっ。なにアレ…… ダサッ。\n こりずに まだ やってるわよ。\n 時間のム:
Pfft...look at that. He's still working on
that light. What a waste of time. Haha!

169922.「そんな 私でしたからね……。\n 重要な席での失敗により アルケミアを\n 追:
Because of one simple mistake in front of a
few important people, I was mocked at the
Alchemia.

169923.「そして ついに アルケミアからクビを\n 言いわたされ 途方にくれていた その:
Finally, the Royal Alchemia fired me, and I
was at a loss... then Master Quard appeared
before me.

169924.「あ…あなたは 王族のクオード様！？\n どうして ここに？:
Oh? Oh! You're Prince Quard, right! What are
you doing here?

169925.「先日の発表会以来 貴様のことが気になってな。\n たびたび 様子をうかがってい:
You've been on my mind ever since that presentation. I've been watching you, and I have to say...I can't watch you do this
anymore.

169926.「貴様の その あきらめの悪さにな。\n 何度 失敗しても 同じことに挑み続ける:
You refuse to give up. You keep trying over
and over again no matter how many times you
fail. Some might call that insanity.

169927.「……だが その しつこさも才能か。\n 少なくとも ただ他人をバカにし 見下す:
But I think that persistence is a talent.
You've got far more value than those cowards
that look down on you and mock you.

169928.「……行くあてがないのなら 俺のもとに来い！\n そして 必ずや 貴様の信じる錬:
...If you have nowhere else to go, come with
me! You will surely succeed in the alchemy
you believe in!

169929.「そう言って クオード様は その場で\n 私を 自身の個人的な臣下として\n 迎:
And so, Master Quard took me in as one of his
personal retainers.

169930.「その時は うれしさの反面\n なんて もの好きな人と 思ったものですが\n 後:
At the time, I was happy. But I also wondered
what it is he saw in me.

169931.「じつは クオード様自身 王族という身で\n あらせられながら 時渡りのチカラが:
Although he is royalty, Quard himself had a
difficult childhood because of his weak sense
of time travel.

169932.「今でこそ 武功を重ね 軍団長という地位にまで\n のぼりつめましたが 子供のこ:
Although he has risen to the position of corps commander through his military exploits, his father's disapproval of him as a child was
very strong.

169933.「クオード様は 誰よりも 努力し\n 自らの手で 成功への道を 切りひらいたお方:
Master Quard has worked harder than anyone.
He made his success with his own two hands.

169934.「だからこそ 最初から できないと\n 決めつけることが お嫌いだったのでしょう:
That's why he didn't like me assuming I would
never be able to succeed.

169935.「クオード様は……\n こんな しがない錬金術師の私にまで\n 可能性を見出し:
Master Quard saw the potential in even a
humble alchemist like me. He believed in me.

169936.「星華のライトの改良は 続けておりますよぅ。\n いまだ 壊れやすくて\n 完成:
I'm continuing to improve the Starlight. It's
still fragile and far from a finished
product...

169937.「……はは。少し おしゃべりをし過ぎましたね。\n 私が こんな話をしたことは:
Ha-ha-ha. We talked a little too much, didn't
we? Please don't tell Mr. Quard that I told
you this.

169938.「さて。そろそろ 錬金も終わるころ……\n 釜の様子を 確認してみましょう。:
Well... Alchemy Pot should be finished by
now... so let's check on the light.

169939.「おお うまくいっているようですね。\n これこそが 星華のライトですよぅ！\n:
It seems to have worked. Here it is: a
finished Starlight. Let's go give it to
Master Quard.

169940.「私は クオード様を呼んでから 向かいますので\n <pc>さんは 先に\n 転:
I'll call Master Quard. <pc>,
you go wait by the relay gate first. Me and
Master Quard will meet you there.

178554.「あれは…… ダメだな。\n とっとと あきらめれば いいのに。\n アイツには:
That... is no good. Why doesn't he just give
up? He can't do it. Ha-ha-ha.

179527.「ここは いったい なんだ！？\n どうして 絵画の中に\n こんな世界が 広が:
What the hell is this place? Why is there this
world inside the painting?

179528.「……いや。そもそも 屋敷そのものが\n あの魔物によって 作り出されたもの……:
It's probably safe to assume this place was
created by that monster too.
